pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Method for Visualization of Pharmacometric Models // A method to visualize pharmacometric analyses which are impacted by covariate effects. Variability-aligned covariate harmonized- effects and time-transformation equivalent ('vachette') facilitates intuitive overlays of data and model predictions, allowing for comprehensive comparison without dilution effects. 'vachette' improves upon previous methods Lommerse et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/psp4.12679, enabling its application to all pharmacometric models and enhancing Visual Predictive Checks (VPC) by integrating data into cohesive plots that can highlight model misspecification.
